content:
Hi. Looking at an institutional IG template. So far this is the idea:
pasted image

some questions so far:
1. each editor will have some content (some pages, etc) that they will create, but other pages are fixed by the institution.
Except for copy-paste of files and using a "template" ig that everyone must start with, is there a way to allow a user to do only their content, and not depend on / bother with what is in the template? If a user just needs to fill in a couple of pages in a section and add 2 resources, they shouldn't need to replicate the rest, right?

Grahame indicated he plans to introdue support for "templates" referenced using the packaging mechanism "soon" - in theory in the weeks after the ballot opens. That should provide what you're looking for, I think.
Ok i Will collect any requirements and hand it to him in a nice form
Is there documentation on how to create them anywhere?
